verses.roman:
icchāya ananta mūrti karena prakāśa
eka eka mūrte karena brahmāṇḍe praveśa

synonyms: icchāya—by His will; ananta mūrti—unlimited forms; karena—does; prakāśa—manifestation; eka eka—each and every; mūrte—form; karena—does; brahmāṇḍe—within the universe; praveśa—entrance.
translation: By His will He manifests Himself in unlimited forms, in which He enters each and every universe.
